description.narrative: To improve the scale and effectiveness of philanthropy in the area of global marine fisheries. The principal goal of this half-year project is the development of a coherent philanthropic strategy for the reform of commercial fisheries worldwide. The project will pool the collective wisdom and understanding of the main funders of marine conservation to assemble a world class team of scientists and fisheries experts to identify current best practices in fisheries and marine management; to collaborate with the advisors and leading NGOs to establish a vision and road map for how philanthropy can accelerate the adoption of these best practices; and to use that vision to priorities work among the foundations and ideally recruit new funders into the marine conservation arena

participating-org.narrative: The Board of Trustees of the Leland Stanford, Jr. University
